FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance of the GO1 Course. Displayed at the top of each page.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: loid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the external GO1 Learning Object ID

FIELD.NAME: loname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the external GO1 Learning Object name

FIELD.NAME: token
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the external GO1 Learning Object usage token

FIELD.NAME: completionsubmit
FIELD.COMMENT: If this field is set to 1, then the activity will be automatically marked as 'complete' once the user submits their assignment.

FIELD.NAME: popup
FIELD.COMMENT: If this field is set to 1, then the activity will be automatically launched in a new window.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance was first created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified.

FIELD.NAME: location
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the last stored position of the users progression in the GO1 Course.

FIELD.NAME: completed
FIELD.COMMENT: If this field is set to 1 the user's completion status is 'in progress', if this field is set to 2 the user has completed the GO1 course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time that the user last had an interaction with the GO1 Course.
